title: The Dark Tower IV: Wizard and Glass
itunes:title: The Dark Tower IV: Wizard and Glass
itunes:subtitle: Constant Listeners, say goodbye to Blaine and make your way through the Topeka railway station. Beware, this is not the Kansas of your world and watch out for the walking dude. Head down the turnpike with Losers Randall Colburn, Ayisha Gatson, Dan Pfle...
description:
Constant Listeners, say goodbye to Blaine and make your way through the Topeka railway station. Beware, this is not the Kansas of your world and watch out for the walking dude. Head down the turnpike with Losers Randall Colburn, Ayisha Gatson, Dan Pfleegor, and McKenzie Gerber as they discuss Stephen King's The Dark Tower IV: Wizard and Glass. Together, the ka-tet palavers over the necessity of origin stories, themes of friendship and first love, and how King's Dominion became its own interconnected universe


.Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon | Store


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
